title: Augment Cache
body: After purchasing all of the available project loot crates for IP i'm left with 2 augment cache fragments and a bunch of other useless stuff, is it just supposed to sit there and be useless or will we be able to do anything with them without paying RP?

replies.body: Buying all the IP purchasable crates will result with extra fragments.  Purchasing Augment Caches will have a chance to drop additional fragments, or extra content might be disenchanted after the event is over.  We have more details on this in our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!
